titleStmt.title: A senhora viscondessa: Edição para o ELTeC
titleStmt.author: Lima, Sebastião de Magalhães (1850-1928)

respStmt.resp: Codificação segundo as normas do ELTeC
respStmt.name: Diana Santos

publicationStmt.publisher: COST Action "Distant Reading for European Literary History" (CA16204)

bibl.title: Project Gutenberg EBook A senhora viscondessa

encodingDesc.p: The information for level 2 (tokenisation, sentence separation, lemmatisation, morphological analysis and named entity recognition) was performed by the PALAVRAS parser, version 14008, with some post conversion for UD-features and ELTeC requirements. Publication reference: Bick, Eckhard. 2014. PALAVRAS, a Constraint Grammar-based Parsing System for Portuguese. In: Tony Berber Sardinha & Thelma de Lurdes São Bento Ferreira (eds.): Working with Portuguese Corpora, pp 279-302. London/New York:Bloomsburry Academic.

w.msd: PS 3S IND VFIN+M/F 1S DAT_PERS F 3P ACC
